parameters.name: EnsRegionId
parameters.description: The ID of the ENS node.

parameters.name: EnsRegionIds
parameters.description: The IDs of edge nodes. You can specify 1 to 100 IDs.

parameters.name: NetworkId
parameters.description: The ID of the VPC to which the vSwitch belongs.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries per page. Maximum value: **50**. Default value: **10**.

parameters.name: VSwitchIds
parameters.description: The IDs of vSwitches. You can specify 1 to 100 IDs.
